ClpRelation.description:
Applies a relation between two clps.

The relation is applied as :math:`target = parameter * source`.
ClpRelation.title: ClpRelation

elements.description: The elements contributing to this dataset.
elements.title: Elements

global_elements.description: The global elements contributing to this dataset.
global_elements.title: Global Elements

EqualAreaPenalty.description:
Forces the area of 2 clp to be the same.

An equal area constraint adds a the difference of the sum of a
compartments in the e matrix in one or more intervals to the scaled sum
of the e matrix of one or more target compartments to residual. The additional
residual is scaled with the weight.
EqualAreaPenalty.title: EqualAreaPenalty

scale.description: The scales of of the datasets in the experiment.
scale.title: Scale

InternalMockElement.description:
An internal model for testing purpose, since at least 2 items
are needed for pydanticx discriminators.
InternalMockElement.title: InternalMockElement

OnlyConstraint.description: Constraints the target to 0 outside the given interval.
OnlyConstraint.title: OnlyConstraint

Parameter.description: Label of a parameter in the parameters file.
Parameter.title: ParameterLabel

SpectralShapeOne.description: A constant spectral shape with value 1
SpectralShapeOne.title: SpectralShapeOne

SpectralShapeZero.description: A constant spectral shape with value 0
SpectralShapeZero.title: SpectralShapeZero

Weight.description:
The `Weight` class describes a value by which a dataset will scaled.

`global_interval` and `model_interval` are optional. The whole range of the dataset
will be used if not set.
Weight.title: Weight

ZeroConstraint.description: Constraints the target to 0 in the given interval.
ZeroConstraint.title: ZeroConstraint

compartments.description: A dictionary of activated compartments with the activation amplitude.
compartments.title: Compartments

not_normalized_compartments.description: A list of the compartments which will not be normalized.
not_normalized_compartments.title: Not Normalized Compartments

shift.description: A list parameters which gets subtracted from the centers along the global axis.
shift.title: Shift

backsweep.description: The period of the backsweep in a streak experiment.
backsweep.title: Backsweep

center_dispersion_coefficients.description: The center coefficients of the dispersion.
center_dispersion_coefficients.title: Center Dispersion Coefficients

width_dispersion_coefficients.description: The width coefficients of the dispersion.
width_dispersion_coefficients.title: Width Dispersion Coefficients
